price: ߛߊ߬ߦߊ ߞߊ߬ߟߏ ߘߌ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߌ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߘߐߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wajāat sakratu al-mawti bil-ḥaqi dhālika mā kunta min'hu taḥīdu
